channel.title: Kubernetes on Mischa van den Burg
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on Mischa van den Burg

item.title: Get a free 4 CPU 24GB Ram VM on from Oracle
item.description: A few weeks ago someone gave me a tip. Oracle actually has a really good free tier offering. You can host a 4CPU 24GB VM for free! This is perfect for a lab environment. I spent my evening creating the VM and setting up a kubernetes cluster from scratch. Use this video to claim your free vm: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NKc3k7xceT8
item.content:encoded:
A few weeks ago someone gave me a tip. Oracle actually has a really good free tier offering.

You can host a 4CPU 24GB VM for free!

This is perfect for a lab environment.

I spent my evening creating the VM and setting up a kubernetes cluster from scratch.

Use this video to claim your free vm:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NKc3k7xceT8
